mapper.select: SELECT id, club_id, content, create_date FROM ( SELECT N.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rownum desc) RN from notice N where N.club_id=#{param1}) where RN <= #{param2}*10 and RN > (#{param2}-1)*10

SELECT SUB.id, SUB.member_id, pf.nickname, SUB.content, SUB.create_date, LAG(SUB.id, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY SUB.id desc) AS nextId, LEAD(SUB.id, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY SUB.id desc) AS previusId FROM ( SELECT P.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY rownum desc) RN from post P where P.club_id=#{param1}) SUB, profile pf where SUB.RN <= #{param2}*10 and SUB.RN > (#{param2}-1)*10 and pf.member_id=SUB.member_id and SUB.club_id=pf.club_id

SELECT p.id, p.member_id, pf.nickname, p.content, p.create_date, LAG(p.id, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY p.id desc) AS nextId, LEAD(p.id, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY p.id desc) AS previusId FROM post p, profile pf where pf.member_id=p.member_id and p.club_id=pf.club_id and p.id=#{param1}
